title: Middle Eastern beef kebabs
ingredients: ['3 to 4 strands saffron', '2 tablespoons milk', '350g beef steak, cubed', 'salt and pepper', '1/2 onion, blitzed until mushy', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon Cayenne pepper', '1 red onion, cut in half and each half cut into quarters', '1 red pepper, cut into chunks', '1 green pepper, cut into chunks', 'olive oil']
